generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings and a visible Mercedes-Benz hood ornament, indicating it is a road.
- sidewalk: Pedestrians are walking on a paved area next to the road, which is clearly a sidewalk.
- building: Multiple buildings are visible in the background and on the right side of the image.
- vegetation: Trees are visible on the left side of the image and in front of the building on the right.
- sky: The sky is visible above the buildings and trees, appearing overcast.
- person: Two individuals are walking on the sidewalk on the right side of the image.
- car: A blue car is visible crossing the road in the middle of the image.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including traffic light poles and a pole with a traffic sign.
- traffic light: Traffic lights are visible at the intersection, mounted on poles.
- traffic sign: A traffic sign is visible on a pole near the traffic lights.
